org.bushe.swing.event
Interface EventSubscriber

public interface EventSubscriber

Interface for classes that subscribe to EventServiceEvents from an EventService.

Author:
Michael Bushe michael@bushe.com

Method Summary
 void onEvent(EventServiceEvent evt)
          Handle a published event.
 

Method Detail

onEvent

public void onEvent(EventServiceEvent evt)
Handle a published event.

The EventService calls this method on each publication of subscribed EventServiceEvents.

Prequisite: EventSubscriber has subscribed for the EventServiceEvent type with the EventService.

See EventService

Parameters:
evt - The EventServiceEvent that is being published.
